subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Sports and the industry that envelops them are increasingly fueled by comebacks, but there has never been anything quite like the returns that Tiger Woods and Caster Semenya are intent on making.
snippet: Sports and the industry that envelops them are increasingly fueled by comebacks, but there has never been anything quite like the returns that Tiger Woods and Caster Semenya are intent on making.
